title: Mobile Mathematics Microlearning Design for Adult Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to interpret basic work-related data
context.additional_context: Need for modular content design enabling self-directed learning in smartphone-based constrained technological environments, emphasizing applicability to tasks in medical, legal, and technical professions

learning_goals: Learners can improve work-related mathematical problem-solving skills by 30% using CBI in mobile environments.
Learners are motivated to voluntarily complete microlearning modules at least twice weekly.
Personalized learning paths are adjusted by 80% or more based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
